doc.title: Ebola Warning
doc.plot: In 1978 Centers for Disease Control recorded a top secret 8mm videotape for authorized personnel only. The film footage shows a hidden EBOLA experiment with an unidentified patient and a mysterious man in a black suit. The tape has been hidden for over 30 years. The film director Martin Sommerdag explains; my father worked at the CDC for many years and when he suddenly died in 1997 I inherited the key to his safe and found a top secret tape stamped; EBOLA WARNING.
